t: Amazon Fresh expands in Pennsylvania | Chain Store Age
s: November 7, 2024 - Amazon debuted Amazon Fresh in 2020, in Woodland Hills, Calif. Other recent Amazon Fresh store openings include four units opened in Roseville, Calif., Tinley Park, Ill., Lodi, N.J. and Bensalem, Penn. in late August 2024, and a location which launched in Eatontown, N.J.

t: Amazon signs lease for new Pennsylvania 'fulfillment center' in Bensalem
s: August 6, 2020 - A new Amazon warehouse is opening in Bensalem, Pennsylvania, after the company signed one of many lease agreements they are considering in the Philadelphia and Lehigh Valley regions. The space is approximately 200,000-square-feet.
